name: experimental_design
description: A plan that states how treatments are allocated to the experimental units during an agronomic trial

name: nue
description: Nitrogen Use Efficiency is the ratio between the amount of nitrogen fertilizer removed from the field by the crop and the amount of nitrogen fertilizer applied. It provides information about the relative utilization of additional nitrogen applied to a agricultural production system

name: pue
description: Phosphorus Use Efficiency is the ratio between the amount of phosphorus fertilizer removed from the field by the crop and the amount of phosphorus fertilizer applied.

name: kue
description: Potassium Use Efficiency is the ratio between the amount of potassium fertilizer removed from the field by the crop and the amount of potassium fertilizer applied.

name: fertilizer_cost
description: Total cost of fertilization over the cropping season per hectare
